body_html: might not be obvious: on top of building a such a dll, another thing is needed - the code in the dll would want to call say the c api that is in tensorflow.dll. On windows such public api's would need to be declared with dllexport so a new dll can link against tensorflow.dll and resolve references to the public api (for example the c api). Loading such a dll via tf.load_library() should kind of work on windows.
